name: 莊惠鈞
objective:
本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力，並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
This course is expected to expand students’ writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions. Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.
schedule:
(Tentative Schedule)

W1
Course introduction: Overview of academic writing and descriptive strategies for argumentation.

W2
Introduction to Conceptual Metaphor (CM) and figurative thinking in academic discourse.

W3
Identifying CM in academic texts.
CM as a cognitive tool for structuring arguments.

W4
Analyzing CM uses in scholarly articles (guided annotation activity).

W5
Integrating CM into descriptive academic writing to enhance argumentative clarity.

W6–8 Writing Workshops

W9  Midterm Exam

W10–11 Building Arguments through Conceptual Metaphor and AI.

W12 Cohesion, Coherence, and Structure I

W13 Cohesion, Coherence, and Structure II

W14 Cohesion, Coherence, and Structure III

W15 Individual Consultation (Group 1)

W16 Individual Consultation (Group 2)

W17 Holiday (January 1)

W18 Final Exam
